==== Settings Files for RADAR Charts ====

=====  radar.default =====
Setting file available at : [[ Settings:radar | radar.default ]]
Plot a variable in a pie chart. Example:

====== Example Chart ======

<img src="../images/help/RADAR-settings.PNG" width="800px" />

====== Code ======
<source>
{{ #widget : RadarChart
  | query = '
    SELECT ?org (COUNT(?project) AS ?countProjects) WHERE { 
      ?org rdf:type <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization> .
      ?org rdfs:label ?label .
      ?org <http://research.data.gov.uk/def/project/project> ?project
    FILTER regex(?label, "^Th.*Ltd$") }
    GROUP BY ?org'
  | input = 'org'
  | output = {{ 'countProjects' }}
|settings = 'Settings:radar'
}}
</source>
